org.drombler.commons.fx.fxml

Class FXMLLoaders

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class FXMLLoaders
extends Object
    Utility methods for FXMLLoader.
    Author:
    puce

    • Method Detail

      • createFXMLLoader

        public static FXMLLoader createFXMLLoader(Class<?> type)
        Creates a new FXMLLoader.

        Sets:
        • the ClassLoader to the ClassLoader of the specified type
        • the ResourceBundle by looking for a Bundle.properties file in the package of the specified type (or a locale specific derivation) using the default Locale
        Parameters:
        type - the type specifing the ClassLoader and the package of the Bundle.properties file
        Returns:
        a FXMLLoader

      • loadRoot

        public static void loadRoot(Object rootController)
                     throws IOException
        Loads the <class name>.fxml file, where <class name> is the type of the specified rootController and the FXML-file is expected to be in the same package.

        Sets:
        • the ClassLoader to the ClassLoader of the type of the rootController
        • the ResourceBundle by looking for a Bundle.properties file in the package of the type of the specified rootController (or a locale specific derivation) using the default Locale
        The root element of the FXML document is expected to be:

        <fx:root type="{super-type}" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml">

        where "super-type" is the super type of the type of the specified rootController.
        Parameters:
        rootController - the Object acting as the root and as the controller.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • loadRoot

        public static void loadRoot(Class<?> type,
            Object rootController)
                     throws IOException
        Loads the <class name>.fxml file, which is expected to be in the same package as the specified type.

        Sets:
        • the ClassLoader to the ClassLoader of the specified type
        • the ResourceBundle by looking for a Bundle.properties file in the package of the specified type (or a locale specific derivation) using the default Locale
        The root element of the FXML document is expected to be:

        <fx:root type="{super-type}" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml">

        where "super-type" is the super type of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type
        rootController - the Object acting as the root and as the controller.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • load

        public static Object load(FXMLLoader loader,
          Class<?> type)
                   throws IOException
        Loads the <class name>.fxml file, which is expected to be in the same package as the specified type.
        Parameters:
        loader - the FXMLLoader
        type - the type
        Returns:
        the loaded object
        Throws:
        IOException
